name: @darlean/core
description: Darlean core functionality for creating applications that define, expose and host actors

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run lint
scripts.preversion: npm run format && npm install && npm run lint && npm run build && npm test
scripts.version: git add -A src && git add package.json && git add ../package-lock.json && git -C .. tag core-%npm_package_version%
scripts.postversion: git commit -m "Version upgrade to core-%npm_package_version%" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.precommit: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.doc: npx typedoc --skipErrorChecking --json typedoc-out.json &  npx docgen typedoc-out.json ./docs/

author: Theo van der Donk
